channel.title: SW-FRAMEWORK-MMSR on Memo
channel.description: Recent content in SW-FRAMEWORK-MMSR on Memo

item.description: Concept MMSR is an open source image and video super-resolution toolbox based on PyTorch. It is a part of the open-mmlab project developed by Multimedia Laboratory, CUHK. MMSR is based on our previous projects: (1) BasicSR, (2) ESRGAN (PIRM18) (3) EDVR (NTIRE19) Dependencies and Installation deformable conv是使用某一個的implementaiton Python 3 (Recommend to use Anaconda) PyTorch >= 1.1 For now, we mainly support pytorch 1.1-1.4. We will support Pytorch 1.5 in the future ASAP
